item.description:
The Boston Israel Cleantech Alliance connects cleantech investors, entrepreneurs, academic researchers and government officials in Israel and Boston.
Speakers at our events have included: - Shai Agassi, CEO, Better Place - Isaac Berzin, Founder, GreenFuel Technologies - Ory Zik, CEO, HelioFocus - Eytan Levy, CEO, Emefcy; Venture Partner, Israel Cleantech Ventures - Sivan Borowich, Founder, Jewish Heart for Africa - David Faiman, Director, Ben-Gurion National Solar Energy Center - Congressman Edward Markey (D-MA) - David Anthony, Managing Partner, 21Ventures - Ric Fulop, Founder, A123 Systems - William Frey, CEO, Qteros - Michael Granoff, Head of Oil Independence Policies, Better Place - Amit Nisenbaum, Global Operations, Better Place - Hezi Kugler, Former Director General, Israel Ministry of National Infrastructures
Please go to our web site for cleantech news, links, job postings and a map of Israel's cleantech cluster. http://www.boston-israel.org
You can request to join the Cleantech Israel LinkedIn group by going to: http://www.linkedin.com/e/gis/80071/660DF622D0BE
item.name: Boston Israel Cleantech Alliance
